title: late game fps
body: at the beginning of the game i get around 30 fps, then it slowly increases to a steady 100, then past about the 30 minute mark i drop fps very hard, down to 20 or less. it will come back up and drop seemingly randomly, ive tried all the fixes and that guide that is usually handed out. it started this patch

replies.body: Erratic frame drops like this can be cause by bad game files, or possibly drivers having  issues too.  If you've gone over every step in the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide already, then hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team will be happy to take a deeper look.  Just make sure to grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and attach logs for more context.  We'll get back to you!
how can i tell if my drivers are up to date? i updated about two or 3 weeks ago

Most hardware has their own programs or tools to detect an update is ready.  You can also use our [guide ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq1)to locate your specific brand if you know the type of graphics card you're using.
